model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I'm sorry you had to hear me swear like that. I shouldn't have lost my temper like that.
It's okay, I understand how frustrating things can be sometimes. What got you so upset?
It was just something that happened at work. My boss was being unreasonable and I couldn't take it anymore.
That's understandable. Have you tried talking to your boss about it?
Yeah, I have, but it doesn't seem to make a difference. I just feel like I'm stuck in a dead-end job.
I'm sorry to hear that. Have you considered looking for a new job?
I have, but with the current job market, it's really tough. Plus, I don't have a lot of experience in other fields.
Well, I'll keep an ear out for any job openings that might be a good fit for you. In the meantime, maybe try finding ways to de-stress after work? I find that exercise helps me when I'm feeling frustrated.
That's a good idea. Maybe I'll go for a run later. Thanks for being a supportive neighbor.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'neighborly appreciation', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A and B appreciate each other's help and support, acknowledging the positive impact of kindness and gratitude in their neighborhood.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors A: Yes, of course. I just wanted to make sure you knew how much I appreciated your help. ### Neighbors B: And I appreciated you thanking me. It made me feel good to know I was able to help you out. Just like I'm sure you've helped me out in the past without even realizing it. ### Neighbors A: Yeah, you're probably right. We've been good neighbors to each other over the years. ### Neighbors B: That's for sure. And if you need any help double-checking that math problem, don't hesitate to ask me. We can work on it together.' }
```
